additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter additional remarks about the parcellation entity version.

alternativeName._instruction: If applicable, enter one or several alternative names, inlcuding abbreviations, for this parcellation entity version.

correctedName._instruction: If necessary, enter a refined/correct name for this parcellation entity version.

hasAnnotation._instruction: Add the atlas annotation which this parcellation entity version defines.

hasParent._instruction: Add the defined anatomical parent structure (version) for this parcellation entity version, or several if required.

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this parcellation entity version.

name._instruction: Enter the version specific name for this parcellation entity version.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier(s) (IRI) of the related ontological term(s) matching this parcellation entity version.

relationAssessment._instruction: Add one or several relations of this parcellation entity version to parcellation entity versions of other parcellation terminology versions.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation entity version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation entity version.
